Question 3:

```{r}
# Cartesian coordinates 
set.seed(42)
coordinates <- runif(2)

x <- coordinates[1]
y <- coordinates[2]

# convert to polar coordinates

r <- sqrt(x^2+y^2)

theta <- atan(y/x)

polar coordinates <- c(r = r, theta = theta)
print(polar coordinates)


```
